metadata.title: CVE-2020-26557 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mesh Provisioning in the Bluetooth Mesh profile 1.0 and 1.0.1 may permit anearby device (without possession of the AuthValue used in the provisioningprotocol) to determine the AuthValue via a brute-force attack (unless theAuthValue is sufficiently random and changed each time).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
